message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with sentiment analysis and emotion recognition, which are both sub-fields of natural language processing. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of learning models, which is a common technique in machine learning and falls under the purview of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the use of simple techniques to boost performance, which could fall under the categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper mentions the development of a lexicon for Italian, which could fall under the category of cs.CY (Computers and Society) as it deals with language and culture.
